dynaForm.name: processes_subProcess
dynaForm.TASKS: SELECT TASK.TAS_UID AS TUID, CONTENT.CON_VALUE AS TVALUE FROM TASK LEFT JOIN PROCESS ON (PROCESS.PRO_UID=TASK.PRO_UID) LEFT JOIN CONTENT ON (TASK.TAS_UID=CONTENT.CON_ID AND CONTENT.CON_CATEGORY='TAS_TITLE' AND CONTENT.CON_LANG='en') WHERE TASK.PRO_UID=@@PRO_UID AND TASK.TAS_UID!=@@TAS_UID ORDER BY CONTENT.CON_VALUE Tasks
